oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Video - Sentimental Journey
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Park Avenue; trains; railroads;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: From Richard Hoffman's notes: "'Sentimental Journey' annual steam locomotive trip - Summer, 1978. The train carried passengers out to Collierville, I think, and then returned. They used the Southern Railway tracks, but I don't remember where the starting point was."
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Hoffman, Richard
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Justin Thompson; Gift of Richard Hoffman
